title: Side Effects of Owning Your Platform (with KevOnStage)
description:
This week, we’re joined by comedian and entrepreneur KevOnStage to get the scoop on the good the bad and the unexpected of starting your own streaming service.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
